the community guidelines before posting. Let's make this a great space! ğŸ“
How do I cite sources in APA 7th edition for online videos?
Student Â· Feb 22 Â· 3 min read
I'm working on my Week 3 reflection and found a great YouTube video but I'm
not sure how to cite it properly. Does anyone have a template or example?
Shoutout to Jamie for the amazing peer feedback on my essay!
Jamie's feedback on my Week 2 essay was so thoughtful and specific. They
helped me completely rethink my thesis. This community is the best! ğŸ™Œ
